about_the_game:
We aim to create a world without limits. A game that doesn't put you in any box, it allows you to define yourself. Strive for your own ambitions, achieve them in any way you deem fit. Go out and embark on an adventure, set out to build an empire, settle and hone your craft - it's up to you. Your new life is a legend waiting to be written...Spawn in a new world.

Create your own class, shape your character around your play-style

Classes are not set in stone. Your 'class' is derived from the choices you make as a player to shape your character - this includes the variety of skills you choose for your arsenal, the type of equipment you use, the stats you allocate, etc. However you strategise your combat tactics will influence your decisions in this regard.

Adrenaline-fuelled skill-based combat

Combat is completely dependent on player skill in Spawn World. Your aim and reflexes are vital in this fast-paced action combat system. Genius tactics, dashing maneuvers, headshots and wise resource management all play a part in your victory.

Open world, full loot PvP

Always stay ready in the open world. It is possible for you to both attack and be attacked anywhere - contributing to a risk v reward mantra, bolstering the adrenaline in PvP combat. Become a master of guerilla warfare and reap as much loot as you can hold.

Create a faction, build settlements

You have the choice to create a clan with a few close companions, or raise a whole army. Claim land and build up your settlements, from villages to towns to cities. Employ NPC workers to manage shops which your visitors can trade with, guards to defend from attacks, fight off invasions from both players and NPC factions alike.

Large-scale territory wars and political movements

Warfare stretches beyond the horizons of one battlefield. Mark your territory in this world, claim your empire. The world waits to be conquered. Declare war, forge alliances or establish trade routes. The path is yours to carve as a new king or queen of lands. You can build a settlement, but can you hold it? Prepare for siege warfare, either to claim more territory or to defend what you already have.

Living, breathing sandbox world

Explore a world brimming with life and excitement - immerse yourself not only with other players, but also procedurally generated NPC factions with their own settlements, diplomatic relations, ambitions, unique lore and constantly evolving lineage.

Player-driven economy

The value of resources is based on supply and demand. The markets are a free trade without any constraints set by the game itself. The players decide the value of everything.

Total freedom, create your own legend

Whether you decide to build an empire, or live on a remote island as a hermit is down for you to choose. Become a revered king, famous mercenary or master trader - whatever and whoever you want to be.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains fantasy violence, death, blood and gore.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5 4th generation or AMD FX 6300 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750TI or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel i7 7th generation or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6G or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
